dish: Asparagus, Mushroom, Leek, and Cheese Galette
description: A crispy, flaky, and buttery free-form crust wraps around a savory filling of spring ingredientsâ€”tender asparagus, melted leeks, and earthy mushrooms, with Fontina cheese tying everything together.
ingredients: 1/4 cup plus 1 tablespoon (75ml) extra-virgin olive oil, divided, plus more for drizzling
1 pound (450g) mixed mushrooms, such as cremini, stemmed and caps sliced 1/4 inch thick
1 pound (450g) asparagus, woody ends trimmed, stalks cut on the bias 1/4 inch thick, tips reserved
1 1/2 pounds leeks, white and light green parts only, halved lengthwise then cut crosswise into 1/4 inch thick half-moons
